response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and truly stands out with its innovative features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its value and what it can offer you, I believe it's worth more than just $10,000. Considering its worth to you and the market value, I propose a special introductory price of $15,000 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a premium rate before we launch it to the public at a higher price. I understand this might be a significant investment, but I assure you, it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 15000}
